matrix-project.description: Setup udtc trusty job using system ubuntu make

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -eu
CONFIG_PATH=/tmp/config
# cleanup rm -rf ~/ubuntu-make* rm -rf ${CONFIG_PATH}
# add ppa for external content and source package sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-desktop/ubuntu-make sudo sed -i 's/# deb-src/deb-src/' /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ubuntu-desktop-ubuntu-make-trusty.list sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y ubuntu-make sudo apt-get install -y dpkg-dev sloccount
# install latest system version cd ~ apt-get source ubuntu-make mv ubuntu-make-* ubuntu-make cd ubuntu-make mv umake umakelocal # get umake dir out of the way for coverage report UBUNTU_MAKE_VERSION=$(dpkg-parsechangelog --show-field Version)
# install test packages testpackages=$(grep Depends debian/tests/control | tr -d , | tr -d @ | sed 's/Depends: //') sudo apt-get install -y $testpackages sudo addgroup $(whoami) docker
# ensure docker is using the CI proxy sudo bash -c 'echo export http_proxy="http://squid.internal:3128" >> /etc/default/docker.io' sudo restart docker
# config save mkdir ${CONFIG_PATH} cd ${CONFIG_PATH} echo -e "{\n 'version': '${UBUNTU_MAKE_VERSION}',\n 'date': {\n 'timestamp': '$(date +%s)',\n 'utc': '$(date -u)' },\n 'arch': '$(arch)'\n}" > ubuntu-make-version dpkg -l > packages_list
